synopsis.text: Another bonus ending, bundled with the 7th DVD and Blu-ray volume, introduces a disenchanted newcomer who disrupts a classroom exam, challenging the belief that academic excellence paves the way to heavenly ascension from this peculiar afterlife school. Amidst the chaos, the newly appointed student council president—a familiar figure with a profound understanding of the school's true essence and a history of defiance—steps in to address the unrest. Will the president's past experiences and wisdom quell the rebellious spirit and shed light on the futility of uprising?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
